price: (3) And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.
arabic: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wakadhabū wa-ittabaʿū ahwāahum wakullu amrin mus'taqirrun
